text: Cratena simba is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Cratena simba Edmunds, 1970. Accessed on 2018-02-18. ==Distribution== This species was described from Tanzania. It has been reported widely in the Indo-Pacific region as far East as Australia.Rudman, W.B., 2007 (July 5) Cratena simba Edmunds, 1970. [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1970
title: Cratena simba
